name: Black Pearl Soap
description:
Eco-friendly, all natural soap.  This is 'Black Pearl', inspired by a famous...or rather, infamous pirate captain and his ship. Spicy, complex, mysterious. Naturally colored with Australian black clay. Orange, cinnamon, clove and anise essential oils make this a bold soap. Savvy?

All our soap is handmade in small batches.  Our soap formula is our own and contains: olive oil, palm oil, coconut oil, palm kernel oil, cocoa butter and unrefined shea butter.

name: Pacific Blue Soap
description:
Eco-friendly, all natural soap. This is 'Pacific Blue', this soap was inspired by my precious memories growing up by the beautiful Pacific coast. In shades of blue and green with real kelp powder sprinkled throughout. The scent is a blend of rosemary, lavender, spearmint and lemongrass. 

All our soap is handmade in small batches. Our soap formula is our own and contains: olive oil, palm oil, coconut oil, palm kernel oil, cocoa butter and unrefined shea butter.

name: High Sierra Soap
description:
Eco-friendly, all natural soap. This is 'High Sierra', inspired by our new workshop location in the Sierra foothills, a cool fresh blend of cedarwood, fir needle and more essential oils. Smells like a stroll through a wintery wood.

All our soap is handmade in small batches. Our soap formula is our own and contains: olive oil, palm oil, coconut oil, palm kernel oil, cocoa butter and unrefined shea butter.
